welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Merrimack, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, historic sites, and friendly community. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all private and charter flights.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Manchester-boston Regional Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Terminal B at Manchester-boston Regional Airport primarily serves low-cost carriers and seasonal flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lawrence Airport serves all commercial flights and houses various amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Lawrence Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a more exclusive and personalized experience.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hanscom Field Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Hanscom Field Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Municipal Airport, primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
